blocks.heading: Stop Dabbling. **Start Delivering.**
blocks.description:
Everyone’s testing prompts. Few are getting real gains.\
This hands-on workshop gives your team the skills and systems to turn AI into actual productivity, not just hallway hype.

blocks.heading: Why Results Lag Behind the Hype?
blocks.body:
Almost half of employees already dabble with AI. Studies show the right prompt can cut some tasks to a third of the time.

So why isn’t the whole company moving faster?

cards.heading: Wrong Tool, Wrong Job
cards.description: Teams apply general-purpose models to domain-specific problems. Results underwhelm.

cards.heading: One-Off Wins, No Lasting Change
cards.description: Employees try prompt tips from YouTube. Some work. Most don’t stick. Teams never build repeatable processes.

cards.heading: Siloed Tools, Siloed Results
cards.description: Legal’s on Claude. Devs on Copilot. Marketing on Gemini. Every team experiments in isolation. The company learns nothing.

cards.heading: AI Stuck on the Easy Stuff
cards.description: It writes summaries and drafts. The real work still happens by hand. The payoff never compounds.

cards.heading: No Stable Prompt Playbook
cards.description: A single model tweak breaks your best prompt. Knowledge management becomes impossible.

blocks.heading: A Workshop Built for **Real AI Adoption**
blocks.body: This isn’t theory. It’s hands-on. We train your team to actually use AI in daily work — and build systems that stick.

accordionItems.label: Core AI Fundamentals
accordionItems.content: Cut through the hype. Your team will learn how LLMs actually work: tokens, context, randomness, so they get predictable results.

accordionItems.label: The Full AI Stack
accordionItems.content: Not just ChatGPT. We cover Claude, Gemini, and some open-source gems, so your team can pick the right tool for the right job.

accordionItems.label: Business-Grade AI Workflows
accordionItems.content:
We show your team how to apply AI where it matters:

* Research & Synthesis: Smarter search that saves hours.
* Document Analysis: Extract insights from reports, PDFs, and data.
* Code & Diagram Generation: Automate small builds, visualize processes.

accordionItems.label: Advanced Prompting & Personalization
accordionItems.content: Move beyond one-off hacks. Build reusable, custom AI workflows with advanced prompting, memory, and custom instructions.

accordionItems.label: ✨ 30-Day Booster Support
accordionItems.content: Post-workshop office hours and template library to help your team turn experiments into roll-outs

cards.heading: Quick call to map goals
cards.description: We map your team’s goals, use cases, and current AI maturity. No fluff, just what we need to tailor the workshop.

cards.heading: On-Site Workshop Day
cards.description: One focused day at your office. Live demos, hands-on labs, real workflows. Your team leaves ready to apply what they learned.

cards.heading: Post-Workshop Support
cards.description: 30 days of office hours and templates to keep momentum, answer questions, and turn experiments into production.

blocks.heading: Ulysses Maclaren
blocks.description: Ulysses brings 20+ years of enterprise consulting experience, helping companies adopt emerging technology with confidence. He’s led AI enablement sessions for businesses looking to cut through the hype and build systems that drive measurable outcomes.

features.heading: Report writing went from three hours to 5 minutes. Worth every cent.

blocks.heading: Built on Real-World AI Delivery
blocks.body: SSW isn’t guessing. We’ve been building and fixing AI systems for years, across industries, tech stacks, and use cases. This workshop distills the lessons that save teams time, money, and frustration.

cards.description: SSW’s Gert Marx joins Chris Simon at NDC Melbourne to break down the latest on Contextive, the open-source tool helping devs write code that better aligns with business needs.
At NDC, Ulysses Maclaren talks with Richard Campbell about AI’s growing energy demands, Microsoft’s nuclear plans, and the massive infrastructure shifts behind our data-hungry future.
Ulysses shares best practices for responsible AI: transparency, critical thinking, privacy, and using AI to actually boost productivity and stay ahead in your career.

blocks.heading: Ready to make AI part of the standard toolkit?
